metadata.title: CVE-2014-8961 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in libraries/error_report.lib.php in theerror-reporting feature in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7 and 4.2.xbefore 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to obtain potentiallysensitive information about a file's line count via a crafted parameter.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
